Osmani Udyan Park | Shatotto Architecture for Green Living

Project: Osmani Udyan Park (Construction Phase)
Type: Landscape
Land Area: 99,868 sqm
Client: Dhaka South City Corporation (DSCC)
Consultant: SHATOTTO architecture for green living & JPZ (JV)
Principal Architect: Prof. Rafiq Azam(FIAB)
Design team: Sihaam Saheed, Bejury Ansary, Mahedi Hassan Rijon, Md. Kamrul Alam (3D visualizer)
Supervision Engineer: Md. Elias Miah, Md. Lutfor Rahman
Structural Engineer: SHATOTTO architecture for green living & JPZ (JV)
Landscape Designer: SHATOTTO architecture for green living & JPZ (JV)
Electrical Engineer: Md. Mohiminol Islam and Shams Engineering
Photography by Prantography
